meanings.definition: Having or representing the sun as the center, as in the heliocentric model of the solar system.
meanings.sent1: The heliocentric model explains how the sun is at the center of our solar system.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the heliocentric nature of our solar system to understand its structure.
meanings.sent3: In the heliocentric world of astronomy, the sun takes the spotlight as the star of our system.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as revolutionary as the heliocentric concept in astronomy.
meanings.sent5: The heliocentric theory places the sun in a position of importance in our understanding of space.

meanings.sent1: The astronomer proposed a new heliocentric system that challenged existing beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the heliocentric theory helps us comprehend the solar system better.
meanings.sent3: The heliocentric idea seemed like a bright revelation in the world of science.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a heliocentric universe, with the sun of knowledge at its core.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the heliocentric system opens up new perspectives on the cosmos.
